dataStatic.description: A hidden shrine to the Lord of Shadows built inside a collapsed noble crypt. The altar is made of stolen obsidian.
services: Blessing of Stealth (Advantage on Stealth for 24h)

secrets.secret: The altar slides back to reveal the vault of the Fire Knives assassin guild.

dataStatic.description: The secret headquarters of the assassins who killed Azoun II.
